name: Witchy Kisses
description:
Witchy Kisses is just a fun little game about two lesbians getting to know each other on a date. One's a witch the other is human.  You'll have to play to find out who is who.

This is our entry into Valentine's VN Jam 2020 and will be the first time we ever meet the deadline for a jam! It should only take about 15 minutes to play the game We're really excited to share this game with you and I hope you're just excited to play it as we are to give it to you.

Some notes: 

- This game features voice acting! If you'd like to play the game without it just turn the voice volume all the way down.

-The music is louder than the voice lines so for the best experience the music should be turned way down.

CREDITS:

Sprite art and writing- Ari

Programming- Ari

UI- MadScientist

Lydia's VA- BellaCherish

Stella's VA- ChaneTea
